transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello Hello Hanji
Executive: Ji, Namaskar ji madam.
Customer: Namaskar Gulam ji baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Haan haan boliye. Main Gulam Mr. Gulam nahi baat karunga aapse. Mannan Ahmed baat kar raha hu management.
Customer: Achcha achcha Ahmed baat kar rahe hain okay.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Okay. Mam sir maine aapko isliye call kiya tha ek to pehli baat to aapka sir ek balance amount due hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Wo abhi tak nahi clear hua. Aapka ye concern tha ki aap apna wo PDC check dena tha aapko but wo aapne matlab diya nahi tha na properly usko courier nahi karaya tha.
Customer: Suniye suniye suniye. Manage kar rahe Numan.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Unhone unhone mujhe bola tha ke sir ek month ke andar andar aapko achche se live badhiya okay karke de dunga. Abhi tak koi response nahi hai iske account mein aur dusri baat live hone ke ek month baad payment dena tha. Unse baat ho rakhi hai hamari.
Customer: Ab live unhone live abhi kiye hue unko shayad do week hue hain.
Customer: Abhi wo bol rahe hain payment to maine kaha ki aap aapne live kab kiya hai? Ye bhi to dekho.
Customer: Aur dusri baat account jo hai bilkul missing chal raha hai.
Customer: Bilkul bhi response nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Jo humne product diye hain unse related buylead, fire call, inquiries bilkul bhi nahi hai waha pe.
Customer: Ab bataiye aapko to sirf apne payment ki company ke payment ki padi hoti hai aur hamara paise ka koi matlab aapke paas mein mahatva bhi nahi hai.
Customer: Bataiye kaise kare aap batao.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir dekho aisa nahi hai aapko Numan ne ye bola tha ki agar deal convert hogi tabhi aap paise denge.
Customer: Haan bilkul live jab hoga uske ek month baad mein paise dene.
Executive: Sir aapne proposal bhi approve kiya hoga at the time of agreement haan.
Customer: Nahi main line sir meri hi team mein hai hum log matlab aise pehle aap client hai jinhe unhone service di hai. Other clients ko bhi hum log services dete hain hai na. To baki jo bhi dekho hota hai na discussion services accordingly hota hai aur yaha pe matlab main check kar rahi thi aapne proposal bhi to approve kiya hoga na jab humne payment haan ji.
Customer: Suniye.
Customer: Suniye.
Customer: Meri to fir zuban ka baat ka kuch bhi nahi.
Executive: Zuban ka to hai sir but ye bhi to dekho na agar aap
Customer: Boliye.
Customer: Unhone mujhe bola tha ki jab live hoga uske ek month baad mein payment karna hai. Aap live ki tarikh dekho na.
Executive: Sir che live ki baat kar rahe ho ki jab live ho jayegi services to live to sir ho matlab dekho aisa nahi hai 6 October ko aapne payment kiya tha aur abhi block bhi ho gayi hai aur 11 tarikh ho gayi hai.
Customer: Suniye suniye meri baat suniye.
Customer: Jab 6 October ko humne payment dekho suno meri baat.
Customer: Matlab jis time pe maine payment diya na meri baat ko gaur karke sunna. Aap kya hai ki sirf apni apni matlab batana chahte hain. Samne wale ki sunna hi nahi chahte aap.
Customer: Main jo keh raha hu wo gaur karke sunna aap.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Matlab jab unse hamari baat hui account naya banane ke liye star ka to us time pe maine kaha ki nahi pehle achche se account ko manage karo aap. Theek hai? Aur jo picture upload karni hai uska sahi tarike se fir baad mein missing buylead chalegi. To isko pehle se main de deta hu apni taraf se. Unhone pehle sab kuch ready kar liya. Theek hai? Maine sare documents de diye sab kuch de diya.
Customer: Ab maine payment karwa diya. Uske baad mein unhone Diwali kab ki thi?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sun rahi hu sir main.
Customer: Diwali kitne tarikh ki thi?
Executive: Diwali thi sir 17 tarikh se hamari chuttiya thi andar 17 October se.
Customer: 17 17 17 tarikh se aapki chuttiya ho gayi aur tyohar kab ka tha? Festival festival kitne tarikh ka tha?
Executive: 18 18 ka tha sir 18 ka. 17 ko choti diwali thi 18 ko tha.
Customer: To unhone shayad 22 ko ya 23 ko jo hai live kiye isko service ko.
Executive: To sir services bhi to tabhi tak aapki run karegi na aap haan.
Customer: Aap nahi dena us samay. Suniye aap nahi dena baat kar rahi thi us samay main unki manager hu tab bhi nahi tha.
Customer: Nahi aapne mujhse baat nahi ki hai. Nahi nahi aapne mujhse baat nahi ki hai. Haan baat nahi ki hai baat nahi ki sir. Theek hai na to jisne baat ki hai usko bolo mujhe call kare. Kyunki aapko main samjhaunga aapki samajh mein nahi aayega.
Executive: Nahi wo bhi aapko call kar rahe hain aur aapne bola tha ki main ek do din mein baat karunga.
Customer: Haan bilkul maine baat maine baat ki unse subah maine baat ki unse.
Customer: Hmm. Payment ke liye na nahi hai lekin jo baat hui hai us us condition mein payment dunga main aapko.
Customer: Achcha. To unko Numan ko bolo mere se baat kare.
Executive: Theek hai main bol deti hu aaj subah wo chutti pe hain unhe bol deti hu sir.
Customer: Haan. 22 23 tarikh ko aap live karte ho aur aapko jo hai ek hafte mein payment chahiye wapas. Fir live ko late kyu ki aapne?
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hota hai dekho aapne proposal jab approve kiya tha aapne usi time pe payment kiya tha na agar aapko nahi hota hai. Nahi nahi suniye aapki taraf se to aisa nahi hota hai. Hamara to bas per day ka paisa lagta rahe aapko uski koi tension nahi hai.
Executive: Sir aapka paisa hamara paisa hi hai aur aap jo paisa dete hain usse convert karke aapke liye buylead nahi nahi aap aap dil se samajhte ho jo hum paisa dete hain wo aapki taraf se hi to baat aa rahi hai na. Aapki taraf se aa rahi hai. Jab main bol raha hu ki 22 se 25 tarikh ko live ho raha hai to 22 se 25 tarikh ko payment lo na aap. Kyu kar rahe ho disturb mujhe payment ke liye. Maine to pehli baar aapko jo kam hai aapko jo kam de rakha hai humne jo aapko service kharidi hai us service ko aap achche se manage kare tab ja ke hamara hamare paas mein payment aayega aise kaise aa jayega payment. Batao lead to hum de hi rahe hain na sir manage kyu nahi kar rahe manage to hum kar hi rahe hain lead to hum de hi rahe hain. Aap kuch bhi suniye aap kuch bhi dashboard bhar ke rakh denge to usse usse usse kya hoga? Hamara to time jaya ho raha hai usme. Sir sir genuine detail nahi to hamara to time jaya ho raha hai. Aise nahi karunga main payment sir chahe kuch bhi ho jaye chahe aap return wapas karo. Samajh gaye? Aise nahi karunga main payment aapko.
Customer: Ya to aap return ki tayari kar lo jitne din ka chala hai usme se kaat ke wapas kar do aap.
Customer: Har bar ka aapka natak hai aap logo ka har bar ka is system ka mistake hai ye.
Executive: Chalo main ek bar baat kar lu Numan se.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has a balance amount due.

- Account is missing and no response.

- No buyleads, fire calls, inquiries.

- Live was delayed.



Resolution:

- Executive said she will talk to Numan.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will talk to Numan.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, buyleads, account, live
